body.name: Blahoo Baby Stroller for Newborn, 2 in1 High Landscape Stroller, Foldable Aluminum Alloy Pushchair with Adjustable Backrest. Bassinet Stroller(Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 27 - 28. Order within 7 hrs 44 mins.
features: 【Outstanding Quality】The strollers have a durable aluminum frame that can be used for a long time in daily life and can hold up to 50 pounds for babies 0-36 months of age. In addition, the stroller is made of safe, non-toxic and breathable linens to give the baby a comfortable environment. Handrails and handles are made of PU leather,which is waterproof and non-dirty.

【Reversible and adjustable stroller】Baby 2-in-1 reversible stroller can adjust the seat orientation so that the baby faces outwards to enjoy the scenery and the mother faces inwards to look after the baby.Stepless adjustment that mom can adjust to the most comfortable state using the compact stroller. The adjustable folding canopy make the stroller easier to use , making it an indispensable tool for mothers.

【Safety design】All wheels of the foldable stroller adopt damping design, which is safe and reliable, and can run smoothly on various roads. The front wheel of the stroller can be rotated 360 degrees and can be adjusted arbitrarily. The one-step locking design of dual rear wheels improves the overall safety of the compact wagon. The seat is equipped with an adjustable five-point safety belt to prevent the baby from sliding off the stroller

【Exquisite details】Double shock absorbers on both sides of the frame cleverly reduce the bump during the push.The removable large-capacity storage basket is a good helper when going out. Mom can put baby toys and various baby products without using another bag. The three-stage adjustable awning can be adjusted freely according to different weather conditions to protect the baby from ultraviolet radiation. There is a hidden window on the roof so that parents can pay close attention to their baby.

【Easy to fold with one hand】 This stroller can be folded in one step in a short time with a light press, and it is convenient to unfold.The folding saves time and effort than ordinary stroller folding.If you have any question or dissatisfaction with the product, feel free to contact us, we will provide you with the best solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the pictures!
reviews.reviewText: It’s very easy to assemble and the color I selected is very bright and pretty ! The wheels are soooo smooth and I can’t wait to put my baby in it. If you’re looking for an affordable and also stylish stroller for you and baby I highly recommend this one !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s super cute, I bought it for my baby and I literally have no regrets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller!!
reviews.reviewText: I researched for weeks on which stroller to get for my 2 month old (I’m not good at making decisions) and finally settled on this one. This stroller was very easy to assemble. Did not even need help from my husband 😅 I want to use it all the time! It’s so smooth to drive, very expensive looking, great quality and my baby loves it! I’m so glad that it also grows with him and we can use it for years to come! I also appreciate that a lot of the inserts can come off and be washed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Súper espacioso y muy manuable ..además de ser muy elegante

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cutest Stroller Ever
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is the cutest, it’s so beautiful.Putting together instructions is very easy I really did not look at the instructions to put it together.The reason I gave 4 stars not 5, is because of the folding together. I can't fold it together like in the picture.The Seller/Company has to upload a video on how to do that. They don't when have it on Youtube either I checked.Just one video review, and she folded the stroll like I did.I will reach out to the company to see if they can put me through how to fold it.I will update you when they do.Update***** Before I reached out they saw my review and uploaded a video.Nothing is best for you than a seller actually doing what is best for the buyers.The seller listened and a video has uploaded on how to fold it in the car.I really appreciate that, Thumbs up!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is really nice I love the style/design and how the wheels glides without any issues also it’s very lightweight….the padding inside where the baby lay is a nice soft material and it’s very easy to fold up using one button, The only issue I have with this stroller is the back wheels are kind of wide which makes it hard to maneuver through tight areas overall this is a really good stroller and I would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I brought this for my friend as a baby shower gift . She absolutely loves it . She said it was easy to assemble , it looks exactly as the pictures and she is very pleased . Shipping was fast I try to upload a picture but I wasn’t able to . It was also affordable go on and get it !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not easy to fold!
reviews.reviewText: The directions that came with the stroller are for a stroller that has a push button easy fold option on the handle. As you can see in the photo, this is not the correct stroller instructions as there is no button on the handle. I cannot figure out how to fold this up to transport. It makes no sense how it doesn’t easilyFold so it’s losing a lot of stars due to this. Looks nice, but practicality wise it’s too complicated.
